review: This product is great for viewing Amazon content - especially Amazon Instant Video.  It is pretty good accessing other apps like Pandora and Netflix.  I really like that it has a remote control.On the downside - I wish it supported YouTube video (a big hole) and the layout of the UI is confusing and unorganized.

review: More powerful than the Chromecast and it works with Amazon Prime Video. Easy to setup and use. At the $20 promotion price, you can't go wrong. For $40 I would more carefully weigh my options but I think this would have still been the best price for easy video streaming on the TV. Also the hardware has a lot of potential, if I get the free time to explore. Boots and operates pretty fast.
